channel.title: R on Notes

item.title: Old post about R
item.description: Let’s write some code snippet here for future reference. calc_conf_interval <- function(p, n) { ci_var <- p * (1 - p) ci_high <- p + 1.96 * sqrt(ci_var / n) ci_low <- p - 1.96 * sqrt(ci_var / n) list(ci_low = ci_low, ci_high = ci_high) } ctr_high = calc_conf_interval(ctr, n)$ci_high
